Class SardineImpl

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
Sardine
public class SardineImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Sardine

Implementation of the Sardine interface. This is where the meat of the Sardine library lives.

Author:
jonstevens
